<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distracting Spellstrike](/Feats.aspx?ID=2854) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 44 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[laughing shadow hybrid study](/HybridStudies.aspx?ID=2), [Spellstrike](/Actions.aspx?ID=755)

**Requirements**
You're in [Arcane Cascade](/Actions.aspx?ID=756) stance and have a hand free.

</column>

---

You weave distracting magic with one hand to enhance your Spellstrike. Make a Spellstrike and [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) against the target of your Strike. Do this immediately before making the Strike, but after choosing your target. The Feint gains the [arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) traits, and it always has the basic effects of a Feint, rather than applying any adjustments or alternate effects from other feats or abilities.
